name: d exposito & Partners
description: d expósito & Partners is an integrated, full-service communications agency with a fresh business model designed to help clients win Hispanic consumers and optimize ROI. An independent, minority and woman-owned firm providing in-language,in-culture and English-language communications programs. Dubbed as the New American Agency™, d expósito & Partners aims to be the clients’ agency catalyst for winning consumers in today’s dynamic marketplace.
